channel.title: Sartaj's Govbot
channel.description: Lgbtq: Legislation related to lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer, and gender non-conforming people, including: - Legal rights and protections for sexual orientation, gender identity, and gender expre | Palestine Israel: Legislation related to Israel, Palestine, and the Israeli-Palestinian conflict, including: - Resolutions, statements, or official positions on the conflict - Divestment, boycott, or sanctions measures

item.title: lgbtq - de-legislation - RECOGNIZING JUNE 2025 AS LGBTQ+ PRIDE MONTH IN THE STATE OF DELAWARE.
item.description:
id: HCR 60
log: action: description: Passed In House by Voice Vote date: 2025-06-10 organization_id: ~{"classification": "lower"} bill_id: HCR 60
bill: identifier: HCR 60 title: RECOGNIZING JUNE 2025 AS LGBTQ+ PRIDE MONTH IN THE STATE OF DELAWARE. legislative_session: 153 abstract (synopsis): This House Concurrent Resolution celebrates the progress of the LGBTQ+ movement, recognizes the importance of establishing protections for the LGBTQ+ community, and acknowledges the month of June 2025 as LGBTQ+ Pride Month in the State of Delaware.
